hero.title: Jenkins Enterprise Support & Consulting Experts
hero.subtitle: Helping companies adopt Jenkins. Successful implementation, deployment & enterprise support - we do it all.

areas.title: CI/CD to Adopt Fail Fast Approach
CI Customizations with Multiple Plugins Support

service_details.title: Our Jenkins Consulting + Enterprise Support Capabilities
service_details.subtitle: Explore why startups and enterprises trust our Jenkins capabilities to transform their CI/CD pipelines:

sections.title: Automate your CI/CD with Best Practices
sections.description: Our Jenkins experts analyze your framework and make recommendations to get your CI/CD pipelines automated, up and running.
offerings: Implement the best CI/CD practices with Jenkins as per your requirement and with industry standards.
Implement cost-efficient and reliable CI/CD solutions with Jenkins.
Our Jenkins experts understand your code and application architecture and make the best possible suggestions for implementing Build-Deploy-Test pipelines.

sections.title: Implement DevOps Efficiently with Jenkins
sections.description: With Jenkins now as a tool at your disposal, implement DevOps efficiently by integrating it with different platforms and a shift-left approach.
offerings: Our Jenkins experts will assist you in converting your CI/CD pipelines to pipeline-as-code, making it more dynamic, pluggable and versionable.

With Jenkin’s straightforward configuration and support available for hundreds of plugins, we will help you integrate Jenkins with your in house applications (e.g. Emails, Jira, Confluence, Git etc.).
With great power comes great responsibility! With Jenkins enterprise support, our experts will help you implement controls with RBAC (Role Based Access Control) & making troubleshooting easier.

sections.title: Improving Development Lifecycle
sections.description: Using Jenkins, we help you reduce your developer’s efforts immensely, with Branch Acceptance Testing (BAT), you can improve the speed of development by relying on Jenkins to do all the redundant work.
offerings: Our Jenkins experts assist you in building an end-to-end pipeline for performing BAT, this will make the developer’s life easier by eliminating the hassle of building-testing, and deploying every feature branch before the merge.
Via Jenkins, we can help you create automated test execution suites and plug them in wherever required.
Continuous deployment on pre-prod as well as production environment can be automated via Jenkins.

sections.title: Improved Delivery Time
sections.description: With continuous integration and continuous delivery via Jenkins, we can improvise the release and artifact delivery time to a great extent.
offerings: With Jenkins, our experts will help you build an automated release cycle resulting in reduction of time required to generate release artifacts.

Not only artifacts generation but artifacts promotion can be automated within different environments, which will help your QA teams to test without worrying about the integrity of artifacts in every environment.

sections.title: Jenkins Training & Enterprise Support
sections.description: Our Jenkins experts will help your team to get up to speed on Jenkins best practices and knowledge transfer to drive future automation.
offerings: Our Jenkins experts will help your team understand the principles of CI/CD in general and use Jenkins to implement it with industry best practices.
We will assist you in mastering the Jenkins concepts and help you with any issues you face while deploying or configuring.
We will help you build a future-ready team that understands the nitty-gritty of Jenkins and implement CI/CD with it.
With Jenkins commercial support, our engineers work through the challenges you’re facing, regular technical support, risk-free upgrades, etc.

industries.title: We Understand the Nitty-Gritty!
industries.subtitle: Gain leverage with our proven artificial intelligence expertise & industry exposure. Working with 100+ clients, we know the criticalities, compliances & the importance of getting things right in the first go.
industries.additional_text: Be it an enterprise with datacenters across the world or a rapidly scaling startup, we got it covered!
